definition-item.definition-title: IMPLEMENTS FOR WRITING OR DRAWING (containers, casings or accessories for cosmetic substances, e.g. shaving soap, lipstick, make-up A45D34/00, A45D40/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: nibs and writing-points of ink pens;
nib holders (penholders);
ink fountain-pens, ink ball-point pens, ink pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls;
ink filling devices;
devices for removing or cleaning nibs of ink pens;
assembling, finishing, or repairing ink pens;
continuously-adjustable nibs of ink pens;
non-propelling pencils, styles, crayons, chalks;
propelling pencils;
holders or connectors for writing implements (pencils and ink pens) and means for protecting the writing-points of said writing implements;
mechanisms for selecting, projecting, retracting or locking writing units;
attaching writing implements to wearing apparel or objects;
multiple-point writing implements (pencils and ink pens);
combination of writing implements with other articles;
writing implement receptacles functioning as, or combined with, writing implements.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Apparatus for applying liquids in general
Processes for applying liquids in general
Cutting, perforating, punching, stamping-out in general

section-body.paragraph-text: In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

table-column.paragraph-text: pens, pencils, crayons, chalks or like markers for writing or drawing

definition-item.definition-title: Nibs (continuously adjustable nibs B43K17/00); Writing-points (for indicating or recording apparatus G01D15/16)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: the writing-points of ink pens, by considering their different shapes and materials: e.g. capillary, porous, split or wire nibs; tubular or fibrous writing-points; ball points or felt pads.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Nib holders, fountain pens, ball-point pens, pens with other writing-points, multiple-point writing implements
Appliances for applying liquid cosmetics, e.g. using roller or ball
Hand-held spraying apparatus, e.g. pen-like sprayers
Machining for treating particular metal objects
Hand devices for applying liquid, other than ink

definition-item.definition-title: Nib holders (holders for continuously adjustable nibs B43K17/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: penholders, namely rods of e.g. wood, metal, plastic into which a nib is fixed or pinched;
penholders with retractable nibs.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for removing or cleaning nibs
Recording elements transferring e.g. ink to recording surfaces

definition-item.definition-title: Pens with ink reservoirs in holders, e.g. fountain-pens (nibs or writing-points with ink reservoirs B43K1/01; ball-point pens B43K7/00; pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls B43K8/00; multiple-point writing implements B43K27/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: ink fountain pens;
components of ink fountain-pens, i.e. barrels, ink reservoirs, retractable nibs, closing means and arrangements for feeding ink to the nibs.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Liquid applying hand-held devices of the fountain-pen type

definition-item.definition-title: Ball-point pens ({B43M11/085 takes precedence}; multiple-point writing implements B43K27/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: ink ball-point pens;
components of ink ball-point pens, i.e. barrels, ink reservoirs, retractable ball points and arrangements for feeding ink to the ball points.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fountain-pens, pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls
Appliances for applying liquid cosmetics, e.g. using roller or ball

definition-item.definition-title: Pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls (brushes with reservoir for supplying substances A46B11/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: ink pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls;

components of ink pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls, i.e. barrels, spraying systems, writing points (comprising fibres, felt or capillary material; with roller or coreless tube; electrically or magnetically activated), ink reservoirs, retractable writing points, closing means and arrangements for feeding ink to the writing points.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Capillary or porous nibs, fibrous writing-points, felt pads
Appliances for applying liquid cosmetics, e.g. using roller or ball
Hand devices for applying liquid, other than ink

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: ink refilling arrangements for writing implements with ink reservoirs.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Devices for removing nibs; Devices for cleaning nibs, e.g. by wiping (ink receptacles with pen-wiping means B43L25/12)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: devices for removing or cleaning the writing points of ink pens.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: assembling whole ink writing implements or only parts (e.g. clips or writing points) thereof;
providing the finished appearance to ink writing implements;
repairing deteriorated ink writing implements.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fountain-pens, ball-point pens, pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls
Assembling, finishing, or repairing propelling pencils
Machines for fitting together metal parts
Devices for polishing, finishing or abrading surfaces
Hand tools for fitting together parts
Repairing of articles made from plastics

definition-item.definition-title: Continuously-adjustable nibs, e.g. for drawing-pens; Holders therefor (features common to fountain pens B43K5/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: drawing-pens adapted to draw lines of any predetermined width;
ink writing implements with e.g. cushioned or diameter expandable writing tips;
holders with arrangements for drawing dotted lines.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Generating stepwise movements of drawing equipment

definition-item.definition-title: Non-propelling pencils; Styles; Crayons; Chalks (batik pencils, cord-line chalkers B44D3/00; writing-core compositions for pencils, crayon compositions, chalk compositions C09D13/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: non-propelling pencils (e.g. with graphite, coloured or with short leads), styles, crayons (e.g. pastel or with wax) and chalks;
non-propelling pencils with metallic writing-core (e.g. of metal alloy or aluminium) for writing on surfaces;
slate pencils having a rod of slate and adapted for drawing, writing on slate surfaces;
non-propelling pencil sheathings;
making non-propelling pencils.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hand-held eraser holders of the pencil type

definition-item.definition-title: Propelling pencils (projecting mechanisms for writing units B43K24/00; multiple-point writing implements B43K27/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: propelling pencils, in which the writing core (lead) is projected by a feeding mechanism;

different components of propelling pencils, namely barrels and writing core feeding mechanisms (with sliding tubelike writing-core guides, by gravity, by means sliding in longitudinally-slotted casings, by screws, by stepwise feed, or with gripping means);
assembling, finishing, or repairing propelling pencils.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Barrels for pens with nibs, ball points or other writing points
Pens with retractable nibs, ball points or other writing points
Hand-held eraser holders of the mechanical pencil type

definition-item.definition-title: Holders or connectors for writing implements; Means for protecting the writing-points {(B43K27/003 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: tubular pencil holders e.g. for the holding of short pencils;
tubular shaped, open-ended writing implement holders;
tubular pencil couplings which hold two pencils together;
writing implements supporting means;
holders or barrels with finger grips or adapted for handicapped persons;
holders for attachment to finger tips;
holders for crayons or chalks;
means for connecting two or more writing implements;
writing-points protecting means, e.g. caps.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Barrels for pens with nibs, ball points or other writing points
Pens with closing means or movable closure
Attaching writing implements to wearing apparel or objects
Appliances for applying liquid cosmetics, e.g. using roller or ball
Supports for attachment to hands or arms for facilitating writing

definition-item.definition-title: Mechanisms for selecting, projecting, retracting or locking writing units

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: mechanisms (deformable barrels, sliding sleeves or means, flicking or tilting means, turning means or push-buttons) for locking a single writing unit in only fully projected or retracted positions;
mechanisms (sliding means, turning means or push-buttons) for selecting, projecting and locking several writing units.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Pens with retractable nibs, ball points or other writing points
Hand-held eraser holders of the mechanical pencil type

definition-item.definition-title: Attaching writing implements to wearing apparel or objects involving constructional changes of the implements (protecting means, e.g. caps B43K23/08; garment-holding devices A44B99/00; fastening articles to wearing apparel A45F5/02)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: attaching means for attaching writing implements to wearing apparel or objects, like e.g. tether, magnet, necklace, chain, ring, hook-and-loop fabric or clips.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Clips in their decorative or ornamental aspect
Bracelets with means for attaching a writing instrument
Supports for attachment to hands or arms for facilitating writing

definition-item.definition-title: Multiple-point writing implements, e.g. multicolour; Combinations of writing implements (B43K29/00 takes precedence; mechanisms for selecting, projecting, retracting or locking writing units B43K24/00; multiple writing devices with pantographic linkages B43L13/12)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: writing implements (pencils or ink pens) with more than one writing-point (combinations of only pens, of only pencils or of pens and pencils).

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fountain-pens, ball-point pens, pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls
Means for connecting two or more writing implements
Appliances for applying liquid cosmetics, e.g. using roller or ball
Hand devices for applying liquid, other than ink

definition-item.definition-title: Combinations of writing implements with other articles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: writing implements comprising one or more non-writing articles on or in them.

besides the examples of articles listed explicitly in this group, other non-writing articles are also possible, namely e.g. magnetically means, toys, ornaments or decorations, letter openers, pocket knifes, nail files, cap openers, screwdrivers, perfuming means, bookmarks, key holders, massage devices, golf tees, cigarette holders, first-aid kits or spray devices.

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Containers adapted for handling liquid cosmetic substances
Casings for handling solid cosmetic substances
Hand devices for applying liquid, other than ink
Containers with means for dispensing contents
Hand devices for removing flanged caps
Combinations of lighting devices with other articles
Advertising on or in specific articles
Scanning, transmission or reproduction of documents

definition-item.definition-title: Writing implement receptacles functioning as, or combined with, writing implements (other writing implement receptacles A45C11/34, A45C11/36)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

list-item.paragraph-text: writing implement receptacles like e.g. etuis, pen holding rulers, refill storing containers, containers for leads, containers for cartridges, lead dispensers or chalk dispensers.

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Casings for storing solid cosmetic substances
Straightedges combined with other drawing aids
Containers adapted for pencils or pens
